text: Raipur is the capital city of the Indian state of Chhattisgarh. The state of Chhatisgarh was formed on 1 November 2000. Before this, Raipur was in the state of Madhya Pradesh. In this city, many types of rice are grown. So, this city is also called the "rice bowl of India". ==References== Category:Cities in Chhattisgarh
title: Raipur
